ygData.subject: RE: [eqbards] grouping thread on the Everquest boards
ygData.msgSnippet: 30th.  A good example is last nite.  I was grouped with an enchanter and the spells I was twisting was Fulfil s, Hymn, and Guardian.  Not exactly an optimal
ygData.messageBody:
30th. A good example is last nite. I was grouped with an enchanter and the
spells I was twisting was Fulfil's, Hymn, and Guardian. Not exactly an
optimal use of my abilities. All AoE songs were off limits because the
'chanter was mezzing. He was Alacrity'ing all four tanks (including me) and
never went oom the entire night. Once he got down to 10% after fighting 8
or 9 mobs in rapid succession. Having a cleric, druid, or even Paladin
would have been far more effective for the group but luckily they were all
friends. I was helpful against some of the casters for resist buffing, but
half the time the 'chanter was able to keep 3 mobs mezzed and stun the
caster continuously without going oom.

Kitasi

what level are you? i don't think i was ever at a level where i didn't want
an
enchanter in the group except when i was soloing thru level 5.
